sentences.english: Beaverton's % Mayor Doyle wants refugee and immigrant leaders to participate in the town's decision-making.
sentences.chinese: 比弗顿市长道尔希望难民和移民领袖参与本市的决策。

sentences.english: He boasted that he was the best swimmer in the city.
sentences.chinese: 他夸口说他是本市最优秀的游泳者。

sentences.english: The incomplete blue circle on the city emblem represents Keelung Harbor and the surrounding environment.
sentences.chinese: 本市市徽的蓝色缺口圆环代表基隆自然环境港埠。

sentences.english: This is the busiest street in the city. It‘s the commercial and cultural center here.
sentences.chinese: 这是这儿最繁华的街道，是本市的商业和文化中心。

sentences.english: He bragged that his father was the most successful businessman in the city.
sentences.chinese: 他吹嘘他父亲是本市最成功的商人。

sentences.english: The program for discussion is concerned with the control of noise pollution of the city.
sentences.chinese: 要讨论的计划涉及本市噪音污染的控制。

sentences.english: These Procedures are applicable to the lease of state-owned land within the administrative areas of this Municipality.
sentences.chinese: 本办法适用于本市行政区域内的国有土地租赁活动。

sentences.english: This city each big market management brand female attire.
sentences.chinese: 本市各大商场经营品牌女装。

sentences.english: May I introduce myself as a huge dealer in the line having wide connections dawn a lot factories in my country.
sentences.chinese: 我在这一行可算大商人了，与本市很多工厂均有联系。

sentences.english: Yes. I have only been in town for four days now.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我到本市来才不过几天的功夫。

sentences.english: Article 3 These Regulations are applicable to the digestion and renovation within this Municipality.
sentences.chinese: 第三条本规定适用于本市范围内的吸收与创新活动。

sentences.english: The new products will first be put on trial sale in this city.
sentences.chinese: 这种新产品将在本市先行试销。

sentences.english: It also gave a briefing on the city public staffing the development process.
sentences.chinese: 本文还简要介绍了本市公共职介的发展历程。

sentences.english: I'd like to go on a guided tour of the city.
sentences.chinese: 我想参加导游带队的旅行团来本市观光。

sentences.english: They admired him as the city's best football player.
sentences.chinese: 他们都称赞他是本市最佳足球运动员。

sentences.english: We must remember that the Cold War born in this city was not a battle for land or treasure.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须谨记，始于本市的冷战并非为了领土或财富。
